name: The Paul McCartney Simulator
description:
In this text adventure, you are Paul McCartney, jumping between key moments in your life: in the recording studio with the Beatles in 1968, on stage with your wife and the rest of Wings in 1973, and promoting your new album in 2018 by recording an episode of Carpool Karaoke! Each year is intertwined with the last, requiring you to jump from era to era to solve the puzzles. Navigate intra-Beatles politics! Avoid getting busted for drugs! Promote your album!

With The Paul McCartney Simulator you can finally experience what it's like to be a musical icon, a master songwriter, and a knight, all in one convenient game!
